name: APIStrat Austin API
description: This is the API for the API Strategy & Practice conference in Austin, TX, providing programmatic access to the schedule, speakers, and sponsors

name: API Evangelist
description: These are the APIs I use as part of the API Evangelist network. While my APIs are meant for my use, I do try to be transparent, and encourage outside usage.

name: Acuity Scheduling
description: The Acuity Scheduling API for appointment scheduling. Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders & even payment with one click (and zero frustration.)

name: BreezoMeter
description: BreezoMeter offers most advanced Air Quality Data ever known to mankind.

name: CheckMarket
description: CheckMarket is an enterprise survey tool. The Survey API allows you integrate your backend through a RESTful interface. Uses include continuous monitoring, automated survey dispersal, personalized surveys based on customer profiles and historical customer response data.

name: Clarify
description: Clarify's API makes audio and video files actionable via search and extracted keywords and topics.

name: Data Validation
description: DataValidation's API offers a simple way to check the deliverability of an email address. Quickly find out if a single email address is deliverable in realtime, or check the deliverability of a list of email addresses using the batch API. Email service providers can utilize the batch API to simplify and automate the onboarding, monitoring, and remediation of users.

name: DNS Check
description: With this API you can monitor the status of both individual DNS records, and groups of related DNS records. Verify that each record is resolvable, and returns the result that you expect. Supports A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, PTR, SOA and TXT records.

name: Email Hunter
description: Email Hunter API returns all the emails found on the internet related to a domain name.

name: FeedbackHub
description: An API to access and integrate with the FeedbackHub Core Services

name: Fitbit
description: Fitbit designs products that track everyday health and fitness, empowering and inspiring people to lead healthier, more active lives.

name: Gavagai
description: Gavagai API, our most flexible and feature-rich solution, enables you to add online monitoring as well as next generation text analytics to your products and internal applications.

name: Kin Lane
description: This is the master portal where I access all of the APIs I depend on to run the API Evangelist network of sites. Visit the getting started page to kick things off, and if you have any questions let me know.

name: Link Creation Studio
description: Link technology allows users to include links to rich digital content in their printed documents. Users can create digital watermarks, QR codes, and short URLs to add to their posters, labels, business cards, invitations, flyers, and any other printed items. Digital watermarks and QR codes can be scanned by mobile devices to take people directly to linked digital content. The Link Developer API allows users to create watermarked images, short URLs, and QR codes and analyze their traffic. The API also lets users update the destinations linked to by watermarks and QR codes anytime, even long after they have been created and printed.

name: OneMusicAPI
description: A low cost music metadata API which works by aggregating multiple other APIs and grooming their data for better coverage and quality.

name: Pandorabots API
description: API for integrating Pandorabots AI and Natural Language Processing into your application.

name: Qalendra
description: We mine, fuse and structure data from many sources (weather, terrain, facilities, traffic, prices etc), analyze the data using algorithms specially designed for each type of vacation or activity and generate long-range predictions and data-driven insights for travel and hospitality.

name: RiteTag
description: Enhance your app with powerful Twitter hashtag analytics.

name: Singlewire
description: A list of APIs maintained by Singlewire Software

name: SiteCapt
description: SiteCapt allows you to take screenshots via an easy, fast REST API.

name: Social Searcher API
description: This is an inventory of APIs available in Social Searcher.

name: Super Monitoring
description: Super Monitoring is a website monitoring service, checking customer websites for their uptime and basic functions. Powered by Superheroes. ;)

name: Timekit
description: Connecting all the calendars in the world

name: Trade APIs
description: This is an inventory of APIs available at the International Trade Administration

name: Twitch Bot Directory
description: Sadly Twitch accounts can't be marked as a bot. But many accounts are used just as a chat bot. This service provides an API to find out who's a chat bot. All bots indexed are service or moderator bots.

name: EnClout
description: APIs provided by enclout

name: frAPI
description: Facial recognition API with landmark extraction, dynamic training, simple and fast to use

name: Section.io
description: The section.io API makes it easy to automate gathering information and performing actions on your stack.

name: Spoonacular
description: The spoonacular Food, Recipe, and Nutrition API allows you to access over 330,000 recipes and 80,000 food products. Our food ontology makes it possible to search for recipes using natural language such as "gluten free brownies without sugar". You can visualize recipe nutrition, analyze recipe costs, visualize ingredient lists, find recipes for what's in your fridge, find recipes by nutritional requirements or favorite ingredients, classify recipes, convert ingredient amounts, or even compute an entire meal plan.
